entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: Had a great meeting w/ @realDonaldTrump today @WhiteHouse to discuss the ongoing response to COVID-19. Grateful for the phenomenal efforts & results of the President & his team delivering for NY & LI. TEAMWORK! https://t.co/niWMYVTFmU
